attributes.additional_details:
We do not become adults in this country until we reach the age of 18 I there suggest the following changes be made to our laws.
Make it illegal to buy cigarettes or smoke until the age of 18.
Increase the age of consent back to 18. Ensure that all children have sex education in our schools.
Ensure that any one under 18 can only be charged child prices for tickets etc. Under fives can be charged at one rate but 5 to under 18 are the same rate and  this must be 50% cheaper than the adult price. Why should any child pay adult price to enter an attraction or buy a ticket?
Minimum age for driving increased to 18.
DVLA Theory test taught in school. Every citizen should know the law of the roads when they leave school and have passed the this test. Test should be free.
